pages.text: $(li)Mantis Shrimp are giant neutral crustaceans found in the reefs of the $(l:patchouli:biomes/overworld/water/warm_ocean)Warm Oceans$(/l) of the Overworld.$(br)$(li)These giant shrimp are equipped with two powerful first-like claws.$(br)$(li)They are fast and even burn their preys when they attack them.

$(li)Mantis Shrimp can be tamed by feeding them 10 to 30 $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/tropical_fish)Tropical Fish$(/l).$(br)$(li)Tamed Mantis Shrimp can be made to follow, sit, wander and break blocks.$(br)$(li)When sneak-interacted with while holding a block, one can give this block to the Mantis Shrimp.

$(li)The shrimp will then seek out and break any blocks matching the one held in its fist, if ordered to do so.$(br)$(li)Mantis Shrimp can be healed with any kind of fish when injured, and can be bred with $(l:patchouli:pets/alexsmobs/lobster_tail)Lobster Tail$(/l).
